myopenmath.statement:
The function \displaystyle{f{{\left({x}\right)}}} has a domain of all real numbers, is periodic and has a period of \displaystyle{p}={20}. The graph of one complete period is shown below.
Find the following values:
\displaystyle{f{{\left({3}\right)}}}=
\displaystyle{f{{\left({21}\right)}}}=
\displaystyle{f{{\left({355}\right)}}}=
